title: 15 Best Detox Teas To Cleanse Your Entire Body
author: Aly Walansky
cleaned_text: Get rid of bloat. By [Aly Walansky](/users/aly-walansky) — Written on Apr 22, 2020 Photo: getty We use tea to warm up on a cold day, to feel better when we're under the weather, or even as an alternative for morning coffee. But tea is capable of so much more than that. Detox tea is most often herbal tea that can help remove unhealthy substances and give us a body cleanse. Some of these tea blends are based on ancient world medicine, and they are incredibly healthy. They can be used for liver detox, weight loss, laxatives, or even to de-bloat after eating too much or drinking a lot of alcohol. If a miracle tonic exists, it just may be tea! And we've got the best detox teas for you. RELATED: [20 Best Herbal Teas With Amazing Health Benefits](https://www.yourtango.com/2020330959/20-best-herbal-teas-with-amazing-health-benefits) 1. Twinings of London Lemon & Ginger Herbal Tea This expertly blended herbal tea is made with ginger root and lemon, invigorating you anytime you drink it. It's made without artificial flavors, and is great for de-bloating. (Check prices and reviews on [Amazon](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B000F4DKC6/?tag=tangomagcom-20&th=1)) 2. Consider keeping it on hand for after those epic nights to calm your body and soul before bed. (Check prices and reviews on [Amazon](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0009F3PHQ/?tag=tangomagcom-20&th=1)) 4. (Check prices and reviews on [Amazon](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00AR6Q5JC/?tag=tangomagcom-20&th=1)) 8. (Check prices and reviews on [Amazon](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0029EY2UO/?tag=tangomagcom-20&th=1)) 9.
